RISE OF THE OTHER: If a politician is a fighter, who or what is on the other side of the ring? Leaders can fight for constituents, a stronger economy, or better healthcare. Politicians merely fight against the other party. The negative partisanship in our country is severe. 5/10

RISE OF THE FIGHTER: If performance is the name of the game, what kind of show is it? Many politicians talk about themselves as fighters, I‚Äôve done it too, but there is a dangerous line here depending on whether you define yourself as fighting ‚Äúfor‚Äù or ‚Äúagainst‚Äù something. 4/10
